block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper Plane 34 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. It is the "Spectre" designed by Andrew Dewar. This amazing origami plane has a flat tail and is folded from a single sheet of square paper. It flies quite fast and will zoom across the room. Enjoy!!! If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 033 : Flying Fish by Stephen Weiss", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/7piPdosiC5Q Spectre by Andrew Dewar Tutorial Timeline: 0:00 Demonstration 0:05 Flight Test 0:27 Quick Tutorial Overview 1:38 Start of Tutorial 1:55 Start Folding! 2:57 Folding the Left Leading Edge 4:09 Folding the Right Leading Edge 5:13 Folding the Aircraft's Fuselage 6:53 Folding the Aircraft's Nose 7:43 Folding the Aircraft's Wings 8:46 Open the Aircraft 9:00 Paper Airplane Grip Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
